Generic YesNo
Application Services
a082002e7599481b8b58ad2d5e1d4e43 Service {#DESCRIPTION} Status ZABBIX_ACTIVE pfsense.value[service_value,{#SERVICE},status]
Service state
Application Services
ac0868137ab348dcaae5a7f50bd86f5e last(/Template pfSense Active/pfsense.value[service_value,{#SERVICE},status])=0 and {$PFSENSE_SRVC_MONITORING:"{#SERVICE}"}=1 and (
(last(/Template pfSense Active/pfsense.value[service_value,{#SERVICE},run_on_carp_slave])=1 and last(/Template pfSense Active/pfsense.value[carp_status])=2)
or
( last(/Template pfSense Active/pfsense.value[carp_status])=1)
or
(last(/Template pfSense Active/pfsense.value[carp_status])=0) ) Service {#DESCRIPTION} is not running HIGH Service is not running
If you want to skip the trigger for this service, add the macro $PFSENSE_SRVC_MONITORING:"{#SERVICE}"=0
0 = Service monitoring disabled 1 = Service monitoring check if running 2 = Service monitoring check if not running
e43071de7388443e9bed4e30b9a49c4d last(/Template pfSense Active/pfsense.value[service_value,{#SERVICE},status])=1 and {$PFSENSE_SRVC_MONITORING:"{#SERVICE}"}=2 and ((last(/Template pfSense Active/pfsense.value[service_value,{#SERVICE},run_on_carp_slave])=1 and last(/Template pfSense Active/pfsense.value[carp_status])=2) or last(/Template pfSense Active/pfsense.value[carp_status])=1 or last(/Template pfSense Active/pfsense.value[carp_status])=0) Service {#DESCRIPTION} is running HIGH Service is running
If you want to skip the trigger for this service, remove the macro $PFSENSE_SRVC_MONITORING:"{#SERVICE}"=2 Alternatively you can also set the macro to 1 or 0.
0 = Service monitoring disabled 1 = Service monitoring check if running 2 = Service monitoring check if not running

{$CARP_SERVICES_STOPPED} ^(haproxy|openvpn)$

{$CARP_SLAVE_SERVICES:"openvpn"} 0
{$EXPECTED_CARP_STATUS} 0
{$PFSENSE_CERT_EXPIRATION.AVERAGE} 48h

trigger.expression: last(/Template pfSense Active/pfsense.expected_carp_status)<>0 and last(/Template pfSense Active/pfsense.value[carp_status])<>{$EXPECTED_CARP_STATUS}
trigger.name: CARP Status not Expected on {HOST.NAME}
trigger.description: pfSense CARP is not in the state Expected. This means that a failover could be in process.

trigger.name: New Version Available on {HOST.NAME}
trigger.description: Notify of new version of pfsense available
